title: shell command and execute shell
extract: Shell commands. If you need to execute occasional shell commands during your debugging session, there is no need to leave or suspend GDB; you can just use the shell command. Invoke a standard shell to execute command string . If it exists, the environment variable SHELL determines which shell to run.
extract_html: Shell commands. If you need to execute occasional shell commands during your debugging session, there is no need to leave or suspend GDB; you can just use the shell command. Invoke a standard shell to execute command string . If it exists, the environment variable SHELL determines which shell to run.
